metadata.synopsis: Minsc reacts with anger after seeing Naheira die
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_Actrl-shift-7-> Minsc-> Abandoned CIstern-> Go to Roah BribeFight the fight kill Naheira

0.speaker: Minsc
0.context: NodeContext: Minsc is raging - his Stone Lord persona should be genuinely frightening. The player has just killed the doppelganger pretending to be Jaheira.
